headline.main: LETTERS TO THE NEW JERSEY EDITOR; New Vistas for Women And the Role of Teachers Support Urged for Bill On Pets in Apartments State Is Urged to Pass More Crime-Victim Laws Reader Sees Little Point In School Elections

docs.abstract: Barbara Siegel letter maintains NJ must make changes in educational system to make teaching more attractive to women because of increasing selection and availability of competing career choices
